scripts.build-static: cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp -R src/css dist/ && cp -R src/lib dist/
scripts.build: npm run build-static && browserify src/js/app.js -o dist/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -d
scripts.watch: npm run build && watchify src/js/app.js -o dist/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -d
